item.title: NATO Chief Says Europe Is ‘Dreaming’ if It Thinks It Can Defend Itself Without U.S. - The New York Times
item.description: NATO Chief Says Europe Is ‘Dreaming’ if It Thinks It Can Defend Itself Without U.S. The New York TimesNATO chief says Europe should ‘keep on dreaming’ if it thinks it can defend itself without the US CNNNATO chief wishes ‘good luck’ to those who think Europe can defend itself without US help AP NewsNATO boss Rutte slaps down calls for European army prompted by Trump fears ReutersNATO chief’s Greenland deal with Trump blindsides European a…
